MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY21 area of Welshpool, affecting properties in Forden and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.39PM. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed the fault has been caused by a broken piece of equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Due difficulties on site we now expect the power to be restored by 11:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:17PM on 10th March 2021.
